product_name: SealLine Kodiak Taper Dry Bag - 20 Liters
long_description: The Kodiak Taper dry bag fits into bow and stern hatches more easily than traditional dry bags. Made of clear polyurethane-coated nylon, this bag stands up to rough treatment. Uncoated outer surface reduces friction when sliding into hatches. Flush, flexible design reduces snags; 1-way purge valve removes excess air. Watertight roll closure seals the bag quickly and easily. PVC-free construction.
short_description: The Kodiak Taper dry bag fits into bow and stern hatches more easily than traditional dry bags.
